description: This file defines a React functional component called NavBar, which provides a top navigation bar for an admin panel application. It includes links to different sections, highlights the active route, and offers a logout button that clears an auth token and redirects to the login page.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Removes auth token from local storage and navigates the user to the login page.

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Checks if a given path matches the current location pathname to determine if a link should be highlighted as active.
